data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/6aoyUbvu0419XLKLIMoH0TkEicH.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":1900000,"genres":[{"id":80,"name":"Crime"},{"id":18,"name":"Drama"}],"homepage":"","id":103,"imdb_id":"tt0075314","origin_country":["US"],"original_language":"en","original_title":"Taxi Driver","overview":"A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feed his urge for violent action.","popularity":126.205,"poster_path":"/ekstpH614fwDX8DUln1a2Opz0N8.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":46059,"logo_path":null,"name":"Italo/Judeo Productions","origin_country":""},{"id":46060,"logo_path":null,"name":"Bill/Phillips","origin_country":""},{"id":5,"logo_path":"/71BqEFAF4V3qjjMPCpLuyJFB9A.png","name":"Columbia Pictures","origin_country":"US"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"US","name":"United States of America"}],"release_date":"1976-02-09","revenue":28579636,"runtime":114,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"},{"english_name":"Spanish","iso_639_1":"es","name":"Español"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"On every street in every city, there's a nobody who dreams of being a somebody.","title":"Taxi Driver","video":false,"vote_average":8.15,"vote_count":11930}
